item.title: CVE-2019-1010028|2024-08-05T03:07:18.274Z -- php%20scripts%20mall%20pvt.%20ltd. -- school%20college%20portal%20with%20erp%20script
item.description: phpscriptsmall.com School College Portal with ERP Script 2.6.1 and earlier is affected by: Cross Site Scripting (XSS). The impact is: Attack administrators and teachers, students and more. The component is: /pro-school/index.php?student/message/send_reply/. The attack vector is: .
